content:
R 1.345 trillion is the amount ,#,SARS, will collect from us this season. It is 10% more than what they collected in the preceding season. 
We work for this government indeed! Government is a profit making company which not only makes targets but reach them as well.

Ooooh. And don't forget, they steal our money wen we're busy working like dogs to pay the taxes, and what do we get for it, Nothing, zilch, niggis. I think we working class should think of emigrating. Canada n Australia will welcome us. They know we SA'INS ar hard working.
